name: Gifts For Humanity
tag_list: gifts, e-commerce, nonprofit, nonprofits, charity, charities, fundraising, ngo
overview:
Gifts for Humanity provides web services to hep nonprofits capture some of the $250 billion Americans spend each year buying traditional presents.

If you’re familiar with Heifer International, then you already know that a well-designed program can attract money normally spent on traditional presents. Heifer does that by making donations, given in a friend’s name, feel like a gift to both the donor and their friend. In fact, it’s so effective, that last year Heifer raised $115 million.

The secret is in providing an appealing gift-like experience. That requires an online catalog of tangible gifts, printed greeting cards, wish lists, registries and social media tools.

As you can imagine, all of these features are too expensive and too daunting for most nonprofits to create themselves. The good news is, you don’t have to. GiftsForHumanity.org’s easy and affordable web service provides everything your organization needs to capture money normally spent on traditional presents.
